snippet: The candidates aiming to succeed Mayor Michael Bloomberg seek pro-growth policies for uncertain times.
abstract: Editorial contends that candidates hoping to succeed New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg need to present persuasive recipes for job growth that will benefit a larger swath of city residents than under Bloomberg's tenure; notes that Democratic candidates have offered lofty promises, while Republicans have offered frustratingly formulaic proposals.
lead_paragraph: The candidates aiming to succeed Mayor Michael Bloomberg seek pro-growth policies for uncertain times.
